aarambha kara thibena mohothaka pancha balakendraya thulin shri lankawa sanwardhanaya kara gaman karamin sitina bawath mahinda chinthana idiri dakma thulin ape rata sanwardhanaya kara yana gamanedi ratawiruwan lesama hadunwana bawa sandahan kara thibena dilan perera mahatha ethanin nonawathi owun wenuwen jathika ha jathyanthara mattame gathahaki siyaluma kriya marga ganna bawada ee sandaha atha.thawaduratath widesha winimaya ipayima wadikirimata awashya kriya marga ganima sambandhawa me samuluwedi ithama honda praweshayak labena bawada ee sandaha jathyanthara kamkaru sanwidhanayath jathyanthara sankramanika sanwidhanayath laba dena sahaya ithama agaya karana bawada ee mahatha me samuluwedi pawasa thibe.widesha gatha shramikayan atharin wadima widesha winimaya pramanayak ewanu pitubalayak labi thibena bawada dilan perera mahatha sandahan kara thibe.shri lanka niyojitha kandayame me sancharayedi ratawal rasak samanga nawa awabodhatha giwisum kihipayak athsan kirimata hakiwu
